headline: How Rising Price Targets Are Shaping The Evolving Story For Prudential (LSE:PRU)
summary: The fair value estimate on Prudential has shifted only slightly, from £12.76 to £13.04, but that small move sits against a backdrop of rising Street price targets that now cluster just above £13.00. With recent target hikes and a reaffirmed positive stance from key brokers, you are seeing a tighter band of expectations form around where the shares might reasonably trade based on current assumptions. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of these evolving targets and what they may indicate...
